name: Color Cafe
description:
You're the owner of Color Cafe!  Grey denizens of your neighborhood come into your shop hoping for some revitalization.  

Sell customers the color beverage they request and see them perk up!  Happy customers may become regulars.  

Buy new decorations to attract more foot traffic in to your cafe.  Earn money to unlock specialty colors you can sell for more profit!

Decorations get dirty or break with use, take a few minutes to keep your shop in good working order or customers may start to turn away.

Would have been part of the "Cafe" themed weekly game jam, but I thought the deadline was Friday 10am, not Thursday.  Oops.
